net.joala.condition.timing
Interface Timeout

All Known Subinterfaces:
Timeout
All Known Implementing Classes:
TimeoutImpl, TimeoutImpl
public interface Timeout

A timeout which can be converted to different time-units.

Since:
8/22/12

Method Summary
 long in(TimeUnit targetUnit)
          Get the timeout in the given unit.
 long in(TimeUnit targetUnit, double factor)
           Get the timeout in the given unit adjusted by the given factor.
